segments.text: Hello . What can we do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I'm here to talk to someone about a Fixed Asset Loan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . That shouldn't be a problem . Tell me , do you have a Basic Account with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I also have a Loan Certificate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's good . We will come to our final decision based on your credit rating , the payment capability ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we have no problems with our credit rating , I can assure you .
segments.speaker: S2
